attributes.title: Very unsatisfied
attributes.review: Misrepresentation and bad information. Saw politically incorrect information with racial biased information and controversial information regarding Information relating to gov information and Tik tok Information. Would advise against the use of this app and would ban it if I had the power

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: First It took me a year to download this app and when I wanted to go to the bathroom I told me that i couldn’t and it looked my door to my bathroom then I wanted to turn on my tv but it didn’t let me do I delete it the app.  Btw I don’t recommend this app is a waste of time

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE IT SHOULDNT EVEN BE ALLOWED ON THE APP STORE. It took FOUR DAYS to download and it constantly glitches out. It also made my whole phone shut down! I had to go and get it fixed! It works about as well as our president. Definitely do not recommend. APP STORE TAKE IT DOWN NOW!! (also this is the power of gen-z. Be afraid 😌💅🏻)

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app literally took more than 5 hours to download, when I finally opened the app it made my phone crash. How can I support trump if his platform apps don’t work. Very disappointed, I don’t recommend downloading it. Save your time and patience.

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: When I clicked the download button it took 28 hours to load! I thought this was just my phone and it was happened on my friend’s phone too! When I finally downloaded it blacked out my screen! So bad!

attributes.title: SO DISORGANIZED
attributes.review: The font is hugeeeee & has a horrible photo of him as the background. Super disappointed I had to make an account to access information about the president. Such a disgrace. How is he being straightforward and transparent if I can’t see the info. 🙃 maybe this app is just FAKE NEWS.

attributes.title: Slow, Incompetent, and a racist app who would’ve thought
attributes.review:
Donald Trump is a white supremacist, full stop 
If you vote for him again you’re a white supremacist, full stop 
Call it like it is and then let the rims spin till they full stop 
Put one up for big Floyd, the March is not going to stop

attributes.title: A horrible experience
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading, my phone slowed way down, I could not keep the app open for more than a few minutes, and it is very difficult to navigate!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!
attributes.review: After downloading with app my phone started lagging. This app sends so many notifications, especially at weird times of the night. A day after having it I was just regularly on my phone and it took me to this app without even pressing it. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: #dumptrump2020
attributes.review: This app took 4 DAYS to install and even after that I went into the app and IT COMPLETELY CRASHES MY PHONE! I was hoping to help support my PRESIDENT! But that has been accomplished for me was creating TENSION between me and Donald j. Trump. I am very disappointed in your administration and I expected more from you...😒😌🤢🐸🍊🍊
